Im' having trouble getting a positive test on the postback
I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the postback test. Could you let me know which tracking platform or service you're using for the postback? That way, I can provide more specific guidance.

Thanks for letting me know you're using Everflow. Here's a step-by-step guide to set up an Everflow Postback on NewsBreak:
1. Log in to your Everflow account and click on the upper left menu button, then select 'Postbacks.'
2. On the 'Manage Postbacks' page, ensure you're under the 'Conversions' tab and click '+Postback.'
3. In the pop-up form, select:
   - Status: Active
   - Postback Type: Conversion
   - Postback Level: Global
   - Delivery Method: Postback
4. Enter the Postback URL generated from NewsBreak's ad platform under Tools → Event management → Web Events → Create/test web event.
5. Save and proceed with testing in our Ad Manager.
6. To test, append “=__CALLBACK_PARAM__” to your offer's landing page URL.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to set up an Everflow Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/22576502022285-How-to-set-up-an-Everflow-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need further assistance!
